long_description: This Headsweats SpinCycle bike cap can be worn under a helmet or alone. Its moisture-wicking fabric keeps the sweat out of your eyes. High-performance CoolMax(R) polyester is engineered to move moisture away from you and speed the evaporation process. CoolMax terry cloth headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Soft visor flips up or down for a traditional cycling look. Reflective trim on visor increases your visibility in low light. Stretch in rear headband allows 1 size to fit most.
short_description: This Headsweats SpinCycle bike cap can be worn under a helmet or alone. Its moisture-wicking fabric keeps the sweat out of your eyes.
